title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 25 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 25 2022
description:
Mass shooting at Robb Elementary School in Uvalde, Texas, left 19 children, 2 adults dead. Democrats demand gun control, curse Republicans. How can we really prevent these horrific mass murders? Joe Biden and Kamala Harris use shooting to lecture their political opponents to do what we say or you don't care. Golden State Warriors coach, Steve Kerr, who last night demanded new gun laws to keep kids safe, protested to demand the removal of all armed police from schools two years ago. DOJ ‘referral’ of Trump-Russia material a ‘mistake’ by FBI, agent says.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
